text: A question from a fellow XFiles fan out
there. Do you think there are
extraterrestrials in the universe uh and
god allowing human beings on Earth? I
you know I I don't know if there are
extraterrestrials. Uh I'm very open to
this. I I think that the Bible is given
to us human beings here on earth to tell
us about the plan of salvation for us.
But if there are extraterrestrials that
God has created elsewhere in the cosmos,
I'm sure that he has a plan for their
lives as well and and loves them. And uh
I just don't know. So I I'm completely
open to the evidence. What I will say is
this is that on
naturalism, on
atheism, we're probably alone.
Evolutionary biologists agree that the
evolution of
intelligent carbon-based life of
comparable complexity with homo sapiens
is so improbable that it probably
doesn't exist anywhere else in the known
cosmos. Um, so again, the best hope for
there being extraterrestrials is theism
because God could create them and and
bring them into being. But on naturalism
at least, it it seems that there
probably are none.
